definition: farmer's cooperative/abbr. for 農民協會|农民协会
peasant/to farm/agriculture/diligent (old)/government field official (old)
surname Nong
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting

sentences.english: Wherever the peasant associations are powerful, there is not a trace of banditry.
sentences.chinese: 什麼盜匪，在農會勢盛地方，連影子都不見了。

sentences.english: It was necessary to forbid malicious criticism of the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 必須不準人惡意地批評農會。

sentences.english: Tao says, but won't forgive peng cdfis forgive her.
sentences.chinese: 道說農會原諒彭，但是不會原諒她。

sentences.english: It was not until the second period, when the peasant associations were already exercising great power, that the middle peasants came in.
sentences.chinese: 一直到第二時期，農會勢力大盛，中農方加入農會。

sentences.english: It was not until the second period, when the peasant associations were already exercising great power, that the middle peasants came in.
sentences.chinese: 一直到第二時期，農會勢力大盛，中農方加入農會。

sentences.english: Now that there are peasant associations, the landlords can be bluntly ordered to repair the embankments.
sentences.chinese: 有了農會，可以不客氣地發命令強迫地主修塘壩了。

sentences.english: Reconstructing China peasant association is the need of market-oriented economy.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟的發展對重建中國農會提出了新的時代要求。

sentences.english: 59He said this while teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum.
sentences.chinese: 這些話是耶穌在迦百農會堂裏教訓人說的。

sentences.english: To avoid trouble, quite a number of landlords make voluntary contributions to the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 地主爲免禍計，自動地捐款給農會的，亦頗不少。

sentences.english: The poor peasants, being the most revolutionary group, have gained the leadership of the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 貧農，因爲最革命，所以他們取得了農會的領導權。

sentences.english: Supreme in authority, the peasant association allows the landlord no say and sweeps away his prestige.
sentences.chinese: 農會權力無上，不許地主說話，把地主的威風掃光。

sentences.english: On this point, even the well-to-do approve of the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 對於這一點，紳富方面也同情於農會。

sentences.english: Before there were peasant associations the roads in the countryside were terrible.
sentences.chinese: 沒有農會以前，鄉村的道路非常之壞。

sentences.english: These things said he in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.
sentences.chinese: 這些話是耶穌在迦百農會堂裏教訓人說的。

sentences.english: A new way is through the setting up of spear corps under the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 建設農民武裝另有一個新的方面，即農會的梭鏢隊。

sentences.english: At present, it is necessary and practicable to reconstructing peasants' association in China at present.
sentences.chinese: 目前在我國重建農會有其現實需求性和可行性。
